hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Fire Arrows# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Zora Scale#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that if you don't use your slingshot at all when you play the slingshot minigame, the owner gets upset with you.
